item.title: Rhyolite-MELTS vs DERP – Reply to Comment by Gualda et al. on ‘The Effect of Anorthite Content and Water on Quartz–Feldspar Cotectic Compositions in the Rhyolitic System and Implications for Geobarometry’ by Wilke et al. (2017), Journal of Petrology, 58, No. 4, 789–818
